name: chrome-extension-react-vite
description: Chrome Extension built with React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS

scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:content && npm run copy-files
scripts.copy-files: copy public\manifest.json dist\manifest.json && copy public\callback.html dist\callback.html && copy public\callback.js dist\callback.js && copy public\signout.html dist\signout.html && copy public\signout.js dist\signout.js
